    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type ServerClientListenerThread 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int Server.addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    This method adds a player to the lobby if the lobby already exists, if not it creates the lobby with temporary dimension of 1 and throws a FirstPlayerException which says to the executing thread that is has to ask to the player.
    int Server.getClientPosition​(ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    Returns the client position in the lobby
    void Server.isNowPrepared​(ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    It store the handler in a list of prepared handlers, it means that the handler and the player connected to it are ready to start a game.
    void Server.removePlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    This method remove a player because it has gone offline for some reason or it has disconnected.
    void Server.setPlayerNumber​(int dimension, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    It sets the number of players of the game chosen by the first player who connected to the server, it can only be called by the handler of the first player of the lobby.
    Constructors in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type ServerClientListenerThread 
    Constructor Description
    RemoteView​(ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    It creates a new remote view connected with the passed server handler for the client.
